name: Tamilnadu Nikah
description: Official Android Application of Tamilnadunikah.com- The best and only ISO 9001:2008 certified Muslim Matrimony for Tamil Speaking Muslims. Download Tamilnadunikah.com Android App for free NOW itself!  This is a step to make your experience in Tamilnadunikah.com more easy and wonderful. You will receive instant notification messages and can get into the website in a single touch. We are hoping to deliver you a better personalized match making service and improved result oriented service through this.  Celebrated by Tamil Muslims all over the world as the most credible and user friendly matrimony portal for their way to nikah, we have been endeared as the first choice of parents who seek a deeni partner for their children. Tamilnadunikah.com works in an Islamic premise and takes on the responsibility to obey Indian as well as Islamic marital laws and regulations. We do not allow chatting facility and is not at all a platform for dating or just fun. We warmly welcome all Tamil Muslims who are seriously looking for marriage.  We strive to make sure the genuineness of our profiles through manual verification process and thus all the registered proposals are filtered and also we guarantee the privacy of each member in our site.  Register FREE, search according to your preferences, find out your preferred alliances, contact them and get married! Reasonable packages and no commission or brokerage!  All activities done on your mobile will be seamlessly integrated with the site. Download now, register and get started! May Allah bless you with the perfect partner.
